snippet.title: Senran Kagura Reflexions - Announcement Trailer (Nintendo Switch)
snippet.description:
XSEED Games and Marvelous Europe have announced that Senran Kagura Reflexions, released as Shinobi Refle: Senran Kagura in Japan in 2017, is coming digitally to Nintendo Switch in North America and Europe in Summer 2018. Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/c/HandheldPlayers?sub_confirmation=1

Buy Nintendo Switch Games at Amazon:
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
Super Mario Bros. Wonder: https://amzn.to/3GYITtf
Super Mario RPG: https://amzn.to/48QJJV9
The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom: https://amzn.to/3vbsbnP
Sonic Superstars: https://amzn.to/3TLdna1
Hogwarts Legacy: https://amzn.to/40LPwb7
Mario + Rabbids Sparks of Hope: https://amzn.to/48cVDso
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Buy Nintendo eShop Gift Cards at Amazon:
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
US: https://amzn.to/3dsTy4q
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
